struct.name: ForwarderLocator
struct.doc: Information for a single locator of a Qeo forwarder.

member.name: type
member.doc: The type of the locator. Possible values are: 0 = unknown, 1 = TCPv4, 2 = TCPv6, 3 = UDPv4, 4 = UDPv6.

member.name: address
member.doc: Address of the locator. This can be an IP address or a DNS name.

struct.name: Forwarder
struct.doc: Representation of a single Qeo forwarder.

member.name: deviceId
member.doc: The device ID as known by the location service.

member.name: locator
member.doc: The list of locators present on this Qeo forwarder.

member.name: forwarder
member.doc: Flag to indicate the forwarding service is enabled.

member.name: bgns
member.doc: Flag to indicate the BGNS service is enabled.
